mapper.sql: city_id, city_name, zip_code, province_id, date_created, date_updated
mapper.insert:

city_id,
city_name,
zip_code,
province_id,
date_created,
date_updated,

mapper.update:
update city
city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
date_created = #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_updated = #{dateUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update city set city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, date_created = #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_updated = #{dateUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM city WHERE province_id = #{provinceId}
AND city_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cityName},'%')
